column4: U.S. reviewing suspension complaints in Tesla Model S cars
column5: WASHINGTON A federal regulator said on Thursday it is reviewing reports of suspension problems in Tesla Motors Inc's  Model S sedans  and is investigating whether the company urged customers to sign agreements not to disclose the problem. | Video

column4: UPDATE 2-U.S. reviewing suspension complaints in Tesla Model S cars
column5: WASHINGTON  June 9 A federal regulator said on Thursday it is reviewing reports of suspension problems in Tesla Motors Inc's Model S sedans  and is investigating whether the company urged customers to sign agreements not to disclose the problem.

column4: U.S. reviewing suspension complaints in Tesla Model S cars
column5: WASHINGTON  June 9 U.S. auto safety investigators are reviewing reports of suspension problems in Tesla Motors Inc Model S cars  a government spokesman said on Thursday.

column4: Tesla Motors introduces two less costly Model S versions
column5: Electric carmaker Tesla Motors Inc  said on Thursday it would offer two slightly lower-priced versions of its electric Model S sedan  starting at $66 000 in the U.S. market.

column4: Tesla CEO says may source Samsung battery for energy storage products
column5: SEOUL Tesla Motors Inc may source batteries from Samsung SDI Co Ltd for its energy systems in homes  companies and utilities  rather than for its electric cars  the U.S. company's chief executive said on Wednesday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla CEO says may source Samsung battery for energy storage products
